submission:
class Solution:
    def minFlips(self, grid: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        m = len(grid)
        n = len(grid[0])
        res = 0

        for i in range((m)//2):
            for j in range((n)//2):
                tmp = grid[i][j]+grid[i][-j-1]+grid[-i-1][j]+grid[-i-1][-j-1]
                res += min(tmp,4-tmp)

        if m%2==1 and n%2==1:
            tmp = sum([grid[m//2][j] for j in range(n//2)]+[grid[m//2][-j-1] for j in range(n//2)]+[grid[i][n//2] for i in range(m//2)]+[grid[-i-1][n//2] for i in range(m//2)])
            dif = sum([abs(grid[m//2][j]-grid[m//2][-j-1]) for j in range(n//2)]+[abs(grid[i][n//2]-grid[-i-1][n//2]) for i in range(m//2)])
            tmp1 = min(tmp%4,4-tmp%4)
            res += max(tmp1,dif)
        elif m%2==1:
            tmp = sum([grid[m//2][j] for j in range(n//2)]+[grid[m//2][-j-1] for j in range(n//2)])
            dif = sum([abs(grid[m//2][j]-grid[m//2][-j-1]) for j in range(n//2)])
            tmp1 = min(tmp%4,4-tmp%4)
            res += max(tmp1,dif)
        elif n%2==1:
            tmp = sum([grid[i][n//2] for i in range(m//2)]+[grid[-i-1][n//2] for i in range(m//2)])
            dif = sum([abs(grid[i][n//2]-grid[-i-1][n//2]) for i in range(m//2)])
            tmp1 = min(tmp%4,4-tmp%4)
            res += max(tmp1,dif)
        if m%2==1 and n%2==1 and grid[m//2][n//2]==1:
            res +=1
        return res
